creator: agmartin@grupoburke.com
text:
Hi all.

I've just downloaded and installed Tomcat 4 Final on several Win2000 sp2 PCs 
with JDK130 and JDK131, depending on the machine.

The steps are very simple:
- Extracted files to a folder.
- Set: "CATALINA_HOME" to Tomcat4 folder.
- Set "JAVA_HOME" to JDK 130/131 folder.
- Launched: %CATALINA_HOME%\bin\startup

In the log files can be read these lines:

<FILE: localhost_examples_log....>

Any ideas?

Thanks in advance.

Arturo García Martín (agmartin@grupoburke.com)

That kind of class cast exceptions usually occur if you have the 2.2 version of 
the servlet API JAR in common/lib (or more generally, somewhere where the old 
classes could override the new classes - like in /WEB-INF/lib).
creator: remm@apache.org
